name: wake-up-slap
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
short_effect: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.
flavor_text.platinum: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.
